description: Metaverse Magazine was established to promote the work of artists, collectors and projects within the NFT (Non-Fungible Token) scene. Every month, we produce a digital magazine, showcasing the work of creators in the industry, which is available for purchase as an NFT collectible. The magazine is also available as a web version, which can be accessed for free. We aim to create a community that benefits everyone involved; building value for our collectors and collaborators.
